name: The Kuiper Run
description:
CURRENTLY IN BETA. There are lots of features yet to come!

You are a sole trader with a small mining ship. For the sake of earning money to live, you routinely dive into the distant Kuiper belt in search of riches within its small bodies and moonlets. In addition to life-threatening asteroids, you have to deal with rival miners coming to jump your claim, as well as police ships checking up on your (nonexistent) licence.

The Kuiper Run can be played in full, completely free - the price is there if you want to support me and the project. Binaries available for Windows - Linux and MacOS coming as soon as I work out how.

Main font used: Bitmap Banking by Michelle Lehmann / scriptmonkeys.us

Placeholder graphics from SpriteLib by Ari Feldman
